name: Stoneskin
components: V, S, M (granite and diamond dust worth 250 gp)
text: The warded creature gains resistance to blows, cuts, stabs, and slashes. The subject gains DR 10/adamantine. It ignores the first 10 points of damage each time it takes damage from a weapon, though an adamantine weapon bypasses the reduction. Once the spell has prevented a total of 10 points of damage per caster level (maximum 150 points), it is discharged.
mythicText: The target gains a +4 bonus on saving throws against disease, poison, and stun effects. There is a 50% chance any critical hit or sneak attack against the target is treated as a normal hit, as if the target were wearing medium fortification armor.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (价值250gp的花岗岩与钻石粉末)
duration_zh: 10分钟/等级 或 直至能量发散
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 受术者获得对刀砍斧削的抵抗能力。受术者获得DR 10/精金。每次受到武器伤害时吸收前10点伤害，但无法吸收精金武器造成的伤害。当法术吸收的总伤害值达到每CL 10点 (最高150点) 后，法术效果消失。
mythicText_zh: 目标在对抗疾病（disease）、毒素（poison）与震慑（stun）效果时，豁免获得+4加值。目标受到的任何重击与偷袭都会有50%的概率被视为普通命中，就如同目标佩戴了中等护命（medium fortification）护甲一般。
